But @lauradreyfuss and @LacketyLac, today, I am celebrating you and your amazing talent. Thank you for sharing yourselves with all of us.
I am so grateful to get to see this show for a 3rd time in March ... when something is so good, you make budget priorities accordingly.
.@JLTsayswhat and @park24hrs, you are a powerful combo in this show, and your voices on Requiem are so clear and strong. It's very moving.
... hear your influence on this OBC for @DearEvanHansen just makes the show even that much better. Thank you for that.
.@LacketyLac You already know how I feel about your work. You were so gracious when we talked post-@HamiltonMusical, and being able to ...
.@lauradreyfuss, your voice is beautiful. Your performance so lovely and vulnerable. And this track is just so perfect. You are amazing.
... "Requiem" hits close to home in the most loving, kind, and embracing way.
If you've ever had a complicated relationship w/ a family member where you struggled with the "shoulds" and the "have tos" and the "whys"...
And @LacketyLac's masterful work on this track showcases @lauradreyfuss' voice in a way that makes this show hit home even more.
But hearing this again reminds me of what an anchor @lauradreyfuss is in @DearEvanHansen. Her character is earnest and vulnerable and kind.
This track, Requiem, also shows the gorgeous voices of @park24hrs and @JLTsayswhat who make a powerful, complicated team onstage.
And along with those accolades, from me, come joy and celebration and congrats to @lauradreyfuss who is the tough, tender Zoe.
There are millions and billions of accolades for the magical @BenSPLATT, who deserves every single one of them. He is a gift to the stage.
Listening to it again now reminds me how damn powerful an actress and singer @lauradreyfuss is.
This song takes place in the show when a family is mourning a tremendous, complicated loss. Onstage, it's beautiful and gut-wrenching.
Today, the producers released a track from the upcoming broadway cast recording. It's called Requiem. https://t.co/97LlvpdM2i
